Text:
In my application if user enters the IP we need to display the host name, if host name is given then we need to display the IP of the host. For example if user enters an IP address like `173.194.36.37` application should display `google.com` and vice verse. Is there any utilities available to perform this operation. Thanks,
Anil Kumar C

Text:
In my java application if user enters the IP we need to display the host name, if host name is given then we need to display the IP of the host.

For example if user enters an IP address like `173.194.36.37` application should display `google.com` and vice verse. 

Are there any utilities available to perform this operation?
